articles.title: Hackers stole 340,000 Social Security numbers from government consulting firm - TechCrunch
articles.description: The consultancy firm provides litigation support for companies and government agencies, including the Department of Justice.
articles.content:
U.S. consulting firm Greylock McKinnon Associates disclosed a data breach in which hackers stole as many as 341,650 Social Security numbers.
